HomePage.resume: A passionate and enthusiastic junior programmer from Malang, East Java. I am currently a student at SMK Brantas Karangkates, majoring in Software Engineering (RPL). I have a strong interest in Front-End Development, Mobile Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and Chatbot Development. I am always eager to learn new things and explore emerging technologies.

resume.paragraf_1: Hello! Thank you for visiting my personal website. Iâ€™m Ahmad Maâ€™sum, a student at SMK Brantas Karangkates majoring in Software Engineering (RPL), originally from Malang, East Java. Since the beginning of my studies in vocational school, I have fallen in love with the world of programming and technology.
resume.paragraf_2: I enjoy creating user-friendly solutions with high performance. Whether building intuitive interfaces or designing backend services, I always strive to bring efficiency and clarity to every layer of an application. I am a fast learner who thrives in dynamic environments and enjoys solving complex problems collaboratively.
resume.paragraf_3: I believe that good communication and team synergy are the keys to success in software development. My experiences have shaped both my technical and analytical skills, as well as my leadership qualities. I am always eager to work in a team, learn from others, and contribute to impactful projects.
